Webmaker educational resources backed by.message: Webmaker educational resources are backed by Mozilla’s Web Literacy Map, covering the complete set of skills people need to thrive in today’s digital world.
Webmaker educational resources backed by.description: Caption for below the map graphic on resources home header section

Creating for the Web.description: Subtitle of the second section of competencies

Become a catalyst paragraph.message: ಹ್ಞವ್ ಲರ್ನಿಂಗ್ ನೆಟ್ ವರ್ಕ್ ಮಾಡೆಲ್ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ತಿಳಿಯಿರಿ ಮತ್ತು ತಿಳಿಯಿರಿ ಹೇಗೆ ಜಗತ್ತಿನಾದ್ಯಂತ ನಗರಗಳು ಕೂಡಿ ಕಲಿಯುವಿಕೆಯಿಂದ ಗಣಕ ಕೌಶಲ್ಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಮತ್ತು ಅಂತರ್ಜಾಲ ಸಾಕ್ಷರತೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಂದಡಿಯಿಡುತ್ತಿವೆ ಎಂದು.

Navigating the Web.description: Subtitle of the first section of competencies

Join our online forum.message: Join our online forum to meet other mentors like you. Share your events, activities and teaching resources using the #teachtheweb hashtag.

Web Literacy Map.description: The title of the competencies list

What is web literacy button.description: Button for web literacy on mentor

Show others how to make the web.message: Show others how to make the web and collect the Webmaker Skill Sharer badge. When you're ready, apply for the Webmaker Mentor Badge.

Get your feet wet.message: Get your feet wet. Introduce yourself to new digital skills quickly through fun things to read, watch, listen or share.
Get your feet wet.description: Copy for first column in Discover new skills

Participating on the Web.description: Subtitle of the third section of competencies

Resources for teaching and learning.description: Headline for the Competencies/Resources home page

Discover.description: Headline for first column in Discover new skills

We have re-organized Webmaker Resources.message: We’ve changed! Looking for easy ways to get started? Try out our Tools. Or remix something in the Gallery.
We have re-organized Webmaker Resources.description: Copy for the banner alerting users to the IA changes

Exploring.description: Title of the first section of competencies

Discover new skills.message: ಹೊಸ ಕೌಶಲ್ಯಗಳನ್ನು ಕಂಡುಹಿಡಿಯಿರಿ ಹಾಗೂ ಇತರರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಹಂಚಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ

Connecting.description: Title of the third section of competencies

What is web literacy.description: Headline for web literacy on mentor.

Share what you know.message: ನಿಮಗೆ ತಿಳಿದಿರುವುದನ್ನು ಹಂಚಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ ವೆಬ್ ಮೇಕರ್ ಮೂಲಕ ಯಾರಾದರೂ ಕಲಿಸಬಹುದು. ನೀವು ತರಗತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಕಲಿಸುವವರೋ ಅಥವಾ ಉತ್ಸಾಹಭರಿತ ಮಾರ್ಗದರ್ಶಕರೋ,ಪೋಷಕರೋ ಅಥವಾ ಸ್ನೇಹಿತರೋ, ನಮ್ಮಲ್ಲಿನ ಕಲಿಸುವ ಚಟುವಟಿಕೆ ಮತ್ತು ಮಾಹಿತಿಗಳು ಸಹಕರಿಸುತ್ತವೆ.
Share what you know.description: Copy for third column in Discover new skills

Explore the community gallery.message: ಇತರ ವೆಬ್ ಮೇಕರ್ ಗಳ ಕೆಲಸದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಸಮುದಾಯ ಗ್ಯಾಲರಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಅನ್ವೇಷಿಸಿ

Building.description: Title of the second section of competencies

Get your hands dirty.message: Get your hands dirty. The best way to learn is through hands-on making and building! Create web pages, multimedia videos, or remixes that help you learn practical skills as you go.
Get your hands dirty.description: Copy for second column in Discover new skills

Learn through hands-on making.message: Learn through hands-on making and doing. Then share what you’ve learned with others. Webmaker resources are designed to make it easy and fun to teach everything from searching and navigating to coding and scripting, digital citizenship and protecting online privacy. Try creating your own teaching kits to share with other educators and mentors around the world.
Learn through hands-on making.description: Main copy for section below competencies

Mozilla Webmaker is different.message: Mozilla Webmaker is different. We’re an open source project built by and for a global community of educators, techies and people like you. We love the web and want to spread its creative potential to all. We’d love to collaborate with you or have you get more involved.

Weblit map alt text.message: ವೆಬ್ ಸಾಕ್ಷರತಾ ನಕ್ಷೆಯು ಅಂತರ್ಜಾಲದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಂಪನ್ಮೂಲಗಳನ್ನು ಅನ್ವೇಷಿಸಿ ನಿರ್ಮಿಸಿಲು ಸಹಾಯವಾಗುತ್ತದೆ
Weblit map alt text.description: Alt text for the graphic of the web literacy map on /resources

Teach.description: Headline for third column in Discover new skills

What is web literacy paragraph.message: ಮೊಜ್ಹಿಲ್ಲಾ ವಿವರಿಸುವ ಪ್ರಕಾರ ವೆಬ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಓದಲು,ಬರೆಯಲು ಮತ್ತು ಭಾಗವಹಿಸಲುಅಂತರ್ಜಾಲ ಸಾಕ್ಷರತೆ ಒಂದು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಕೌಶಲ್ಯ ಮತ್ತು ಅವಶ್ಯಕ  ಅಂಶ. ಮೊಜ್ಹಿಲ್ಲಾ ಯಾಕೆ ಅಂತರ್ಜಾಲ ಸಾಕ್ಷರತೆಯನ್ನು ಪೋಷಿಸುತ್ತಿದೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ತಿಳಿಯಲು ಈ ವೆಬ್ ಮೇಕರ್ ವೈಟ್ ಪೇಪರ್ ಓದಿ.
What is web literacy paragraph.description: Paragraph about web literacy on mentor.

Join or host local events.message: Join or host local events to collaborate with peers and teach learners.

Browse our teaching resources.message: Browse our teaching resources or participate in professional development.

Get Involved.description: Headline for the Get Involved column

Make.description: Headline for second column in Discover new skills

Get more involved.message: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸ್ವಂತ ಭೋದನಾ ಸಂಪನ್ಮೂಲಗಳನ್ನು ಹಂಚಿಕೊಂಡು, ಅನುವಾದಕ್ಕೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಿ ಹಾಗೂ ಕೋಡ್ ಗಾಗಿ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಕೊಡುಗೆಯನ್ನು ನೀಡಿರಿ
Get more involved.description: Copy for the Get Involved column

Create a more web literate world paragra.message: ನಾವೇ ಪೋಷಕರು,ಶಿಕ್ಷಕರು,ಕಲಿಯುವವರು,ತಾಂತ್ರಿಕರು,ಇತರರು ಹಾಗೂ ನಾವೇ ಕಲಿಯುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಗಣಕ ಕೌಶಲ್ಯ ಮತ್ತು ಅಂತರ್ಜಾಲ ಸಾಕ್ಷರತೆ ಕಲಿಸುವವರು.

Join our free open online course.message: ವೆಬ್ ಕಲಿಸಲು ನಮ್ಮ ಉಚಿತ ಮುಕ್ತ ಆನ್ಲೈನ್ ಕೋರ್ಸನ್ನು ಸೇರಿರಿ
Join our free open online course.description: Copy for the Get Training column

Get Training.description: Headline for the Get Training column

Teach and learn digital skills, web lite.message: Teach and learn digital skills and web literacy.  The pages in this section are full of fun things to discover, make and teach. Our global community is continually adding new activities, lesson plans and tutorials from across the web that make it easy to learn by doing. Anyone can use these educational resources—they’re free, open and backed by Mozilla’s non-profit mission.
Teach and learn digital skills, web lite.description: Copy for header section of Competencies/Resources home page
